    • findDir

      public static File findDir(String configDir)
      Finds the directory specified by the given configuration directory name. All the folders named with .cvs, .svn, .git will be ignored in file/folder by find/search method.
      Parameters:
      configDir - The name of the configuration directory to be searched.
      Returns:
      The found directory as a File object, or null if the directory is not found.

    • findFile

      public static File findFile(String configFileName)
      Finds the file specified by the given configuration file name. All the folders named with .cvs, .svn, .git will be ignored in file/folder by find/search method.
      Parameters:
      configFileName - The name of the configuration file to be searched.
      Returns:
      The found file as a File object, or null if the file is not found.

    • findFileByFile

      public static File findFileByFile(File srcFile, String targetFileName)
      Finds the file specified by the given file name, starting from the directory of the source file.
      Parameters:
      srcFile - The source file whose directory will be used as the starting point for the search.
      targetFileName - The name of the file to be searched.
      Returns:
      The found file as a File object, or null if the file is not found.

    • findFileInDir

      public static File findFileInDir(String configFileName, File dir, boolean isDir)
      Finds the file specified by the given configuration file name in the specified directory.
      Parameters:
      configFileName - The name of the configuration file to be searched.
      dir - The directory in which to search for the file.
      isDir - Indicates whether the target is a directory.
      Returns:
      The found file as a File object, or null if the file is not found.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the target file name is empty or null.

    • readTimeInMillis

      public static long readTimeInMillis(String value)
      Reads the time in milliseconds from the given string value. The value can be specified with a time unit suffix such as ms, 's', 'm', 'h', 'd', or 'w'. Supports multiplication expressions like '3 * 1000' or '3 * 1000L'.
      Parameters:
      value - The string value representing the time.
      Returns:
      The time in milliseconds.
